text: Allaha drstanta barnana karechena ekati janapadera, ya chila nirapada o niscinta, tathaya pratyeka jayaga theke asata pracura jibanopakarana. Atahpara tara allahara neyamatera prati akrtajnata prakasa karala. Takhana allaha taderake tadera krtakarmera karane sbada asbadana karalena, ksudha o bhitira.
